Package com.epam.finaltask.dao.impl

Provides implementations for dao interfaces, dao and connection manager factories.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConnectionManager
    Abstract class which subclasses are intended to provide connection manipulation methods.
    AbstractDao<T extends Entity>
    Abstract Dao, which defines basic delete and getConnection implementations.
    AccountDaoImpl
    Class which implements CRUD and several other operations to work with database accounts.
    ConnectionManager
    Class which instances are used to provide connection to DAOs.
    ConnectionManagerFactoryImpl
    Factory for ConnectionManager creation.
    DaoFactoryImpl
    Factory for DAO creation.
    MessageDaoImpl
    Class which implements CRUD and several other operations to work with database messages.
    TopicDaoImpl
    Class which implements CRUD and several other operations to work with database topics.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PersistenceException
    Exception which is thrown by DAO layer.

Package com.epam.finaltask.dao.impl Description

Provides implementations for dao interfaces, dao and connection manager factories. Also provides AbstractConnectionManager and it's subclass ConnectionManager
